data.question: What phenomenon significantly impacts the properties and functional applications of MOFs?
What is the result of transforming a 7-fold interpenetrated MOF into an 8-fold interpenetrated MOF?
data.answer: A giant enhancement of the second harmonic generation (SHG) and two-photon photoluminescence.

data.question: What experimental condition can manipulate the degree of interpenetration in MOFs?
data.answer: The removal of coordinating solvents or solvents in the channels.

data.question: True or False: The structural transformation from a 7-fold to an 8-fold interpenetrated MOF occurs in a non-single-crystal-to-single-crystal manner.
What is the space group of the 7-fold interpenetrated MOF [Zn(pvb)2]·DMF?
What causes the giant enhancement of SHG in the transformation from a 7-fold to an 8-fold interpenetrated MOF?
data.answer: The loss of DMF, which brings individual dia nets closer, facilitating stronger interactions.

data.question: True or False: The CuII MOF, [Cu(pvb)2]·DMF, undergoes a structural transformation similar to the ZnII MOFs upon DMF removal.
What is the effect of increased interpenetration on the porosity of MOFs?
True or False: The removal of DMF from [Zn(pvb)2]·DMF results in a decrease in the nonlinear optical conversion efficiency.
What is the coordination geometry of ZnII atoms in the 7-fold interpenetrated MOF [Zn(pvb)2]·DMF?
True or False: The thermal behavior of the MOF [Zn(pvb)2]·DMF shows isotropic thermal expansion.
What is the main reason for the large positive and negative thermal expansion observed in the MOF [Zn(pvb)2]·DMF?
data.answer: Anisotropic thermal expansion due to the structure's response to temperature changes.

data.question: True or False: The SHG response of MOFs is independent of the excitation wavelength.
What is the role of p–p interactions in the enhanced nonlinear optical properties of MOFs?
data.answer: Strengthened p–p interactions result in increased oscillator strength and transition dipole moment.

data.question: True or False: The structural transformation from 7-fold to 8-fold interpenetration in ZnII MOFs does not affect their SHG responses.
What is the effect of DMF removal on the oscillator strength and transition dipole moment in MOFs?
data.answer: It increases both the oscillator strength and transition dipole moment.

data.question: True or False: The CuII MOF [Cu(pvb)2]·DMF shows a significant change in SHG response after DMF removal.
What is the significance of the space group change from Cc to C2 in the transformation of [Zn(pvb)2]·DMF?
data.answer: It indicates a structural transformation that enhances the SHG response.

data.question: True or False: The absolute j deff j value of MOF single crystals decreases after the structural transformation from 7-fold to 8-fold interpenetration.
What experimental technique is used to measure the thermal behavior of the MOF [Zn(pvb)2]·DMF?
